channel.title: How can i let multiple connections from my ip play on my 508?
channel.description: so i got a 508 server (running) and me and my brother want to play at the same time , but every time i log in while he is in it we both get connection lost... just the same the other way around. plz help!

item.title: How can i let multiple connections from my ip play on my 508?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I don’t believe a program like AGF/SYI for 508 servers has even been released yet

Read full topic

item.title: How can i let multiple connections from my ip play on my 508?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

[quote=“99hunter99, post:1, topic:286801”]so i got a 508 server (running) and me and my brother want to play at the same time , but every time i log in while he is in it we both get connection lost… just the same the other way around. plz help![/quote]Because the server you running got anti syi, 1 Connection per ip,
